TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegistrationServices extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices

summary.span: Provides a set of services for registering and unregistering managed assemblies for use from COM.

span.span: Provides a set of services for registering and unregistering managed assemblies for use from COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件中的物件正由 COM 用戶端時，就需要註冊。Registration is needed when the objects within an assembly are being used by COM clients. [Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)並[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]使用所公開的方法類別來新增或移除受管理組件的 COM 啟用的登錄項目。The [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) and [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] use methods exposed by the class to add or remove COM-enabling registry entries for managed assemblies. 您可以使用下列方法，以協助您準備登錄檔案：You can use the following methods to assist you in preparing a registration file: - - - - 雖然這些方法有助於在收集的資訊可用於註冊檔案中，它們實際上並不產生登錄檔。Although these methods help in gathering information to be used in a registration file, they do not actually produce a registration file. 相反地，您可以使用[Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)工具搭配`/regfile`選項來執行這項工作。Instead, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) tool with the `/regfile` option to perform this task. 方法無法匯出，並註冊類型程式庫。 methods cannot export and register a type library. 若要匯出，並註冊類型程式庫，您可以使用[Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)工具並[Tlbexp.exe （類型程式庫匯出工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)工具。To export and register a type library, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) tool and the [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RegisterAssembly` 加入適當的登錄項目類型中指定的組件。`RegisterAssembly` adds the appropriate registry entries for the types in the specified assembly. 這個方法也會呼叫組件中找到任何註冊函式。This method also calls any registration functions found in the assembly. 使用取得組件。Use to get an assembly.

summary.span: Registers the specified type with COM.

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，使用平台叫用呼叫 unmanaged`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支援註冊和取消註冊的 COM 物件的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

summary.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified GUID.

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法就相當於呼叫`CoRegisterClassObject`在 COM 中。This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不可部分完成，可能會造成無法預期的結果用於多執行緒環境中使用。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在版本 2.0 和更新版本中，使用方法來取消註冊 COM 中的類型In version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 請注意，使用平台叫用呼叫 unmanaged`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支援註冊和取消註冊的 COM 物件的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter cannot be created.

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法就相當於呼叫`CoRegisterClassObject`在 COM 中。This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不可部分完成，可能會造成無法預期的結果用於多執行緒環境中使用。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，使用方法來取消註冊 COM 中的類型In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 請注意，使用平台叫用呼叫 unmanaged`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支援註冊和取消註冊的 COM 物件的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnregisterAssembly` 移除登錄項目類型中指定先前所加入的組件。`UnregisterAssembly` removes the registry entries for the types in the specified assembly previously added by . 這個方法也會呼叫任何組件中找到的移除註冊函式。This method also calls any unregistration functions found in the assembly.
